Control.Name: AddMember
Control.Tooltip: Click here to add a member to this group

Control.Name: Lock
Control.Tooltip: Lock this group. If you want to Unlock it go to the config and use the Lock/Unlock all groups button.

Control.Name: Hide
Control.Tooltip: Hide this group. Using the Lock/Unlock all groups button in the config will make it show again.

Control.Name: ShiftUp
Control.Tooltip: Shift group member up the list

Control.Name: ShiftDown
Control.Tooltip: Shift group member down the list

Control.Text: Type in the name of the new group you want to create then hit the button.
Control.Name: AddGroupHelpText

Control.Text: Select the name of the group you want to delete then hit the button.
Control.Name: DeleteGroupHelpText
DeleteAllGroupsButton
Control.Tooltip: Delete all groups. Remember to save your group setup before you delete all groups if you want to load it back later.

Control.Text: First, type in the name of the new group want to copy to.
Control.Name: CopyGroupHelpTextDest

Control.Text: Then select the name of the group want to copy, then hit the button.
Control.Name: CopyGroupHelpTextSource

Control.Text: Use these buttons to save/load/delete group setups from your database.
Control.Name: CopyGroupHelpTextDest
SaveSetupButton
Control.Tooltip: Save the current visible group setup to the database

Control.Name: SetupSelectorContainer
Control.Tooltip: Warning: Loading a group from your database will remove your current group setups (so you might want to save that first).

Control.Name: LoadSetupButton
Control.Tooltip: Save the current visible group setup to the database

Control.Name: DeleteSetupButton
Control.Tooltip: Save the current visible group setup to the database

Control.Name: RequestPartyLASInterruptsButton
Control.Tooltip: Press this button to receive LAS Interrupt list from your party members. You most likely want to hit this button when setting up groups.

Control.Name: VersionCheck
Control.Tooltip: Get version numbers from your party/raid then print them out two seconds later in chat

Control.Name: SendGroups
Control.Tooltip: Send your current group setup to your party. They must have "Allow group sync" ticked in.

Control.Name: AllowGroupSync
Control.Tooltip: Allow groups sync: Warning when this is ticked in and you receive a group setup all your current group setups will be lost.

Control.Name: AlwaysBroadcastCooldowns
Control.Tooltip: Allow groups sync: Warning when this is ticked in and you receive a group setup all your current group setups will be lost.

Control.Name: cBG
Control.Tooltip: Change the background color of the ability bars

Control.Name: cFull
Control.Tooltip: Change the color of the ability bars when they are full

Control.Name: cProgress
Control.Tooltip: Change the color of the ability bars when they are progressing

Control.Text: Name of the group setup for the database:
Control.Name: HelpText
